results.name: Triangle P, read by rows, where column k of P^2 equals column 0 of P^(2k+2) such that column 0 of P^2 equals column 0 of P shift one place left, with P(0,0)=1.
comment: Amazingly, column 0 (A135881) also equals column 0 of tables A135878 and A135879, both of which have unusual recurrences seemingly unrelated to this triangle.
